name: Blink (itch) (DomCripps)
description:
Blink is a 2d platformer, made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. All assets were made from scratch during the jam.

You play as a silhouette and every time you close your eyes 'Blink' the world stops existing. You can pass through walls, floors, and all types of obstacles. Time your blinks just right to successfully complete each level!

Controls

  • W - Jump
  • A/D - Left/Right
  • Hold Space - Close Eyes
  • Escape - Return to Menu

Credits

  • Art - Me
  • Code - Me
  • SFX - @https://itch.io/profile/thedoun
  • Music - Youtube: Pix "My Last Dream"
